mapper.select: SELECT PT_SEQ,PT_RESERVATION_DATE,PT_RESERVATION_STATUS,MBR_NAME FROM FIREMEN.PERSONAL_TRAINING JOIN FIREMEN.MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_SEQ = PERSONAL_TRAINING.MBR_SEQ WHERE TRN_SEQ = #{trnSeq} AND TO_CHAR(PT_RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT MBR_NAME , TO_CHAR(TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE, 'YYYY-MM') AS targetMonth FROM MEMBER JOIN TRAINER_FEEDBACK ON MEMBER.MBR_SEQ = TRAINER_FEEDBACK.MBR_SEQ WHERE TRN_SEQ = #{trnSeq} AND TRNF_WRITTEN_DATE IS NULL
